snippet: Citing concerns that its smoke and carbon monoxide detector might be unintentionally turned off, Nest Labs is halting sales of the product and disabling a feature that allows users to turn it off with a wave.
abstract: Citing concerns that its smoke and carbon monoxide detector might be unintentionally turned off, Nest Labs is halting sales of the product and disabling a feature that allows users to turn it off with a wave.

headline.main: Daily Report: Nest Halts Sales of Smoke Detectors
